message.content:
{"id": "23787",
"title": "Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields",
"description": "Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields. The current integration build 09/17 shows that it looks bad on all motif platforms.",
"OB": "On motif platforms, these text fields all get automatic borders, which identify them as user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX platforms, these fields have different colored backgrounds which make them stand out much worse.",
"EB": "To address this issue, the text fields should be created as readonly Text fields instead of Labels. This will prevent them from appearing as user input targets. It is possible that the current implementation uses text fields so that their values can be selected and copied by the user.",
"SR": ""}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '23787', 'title': 'Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties  Info page should not use text fields', 'description': 'Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17.Looks bad on all motif platforms. ', 'OB': 'this looks fine on windows, but on motif these text fields all get automaticborders, which identify them as user input targets.Additionally, onSolaris/AIX/HPUX these fields have different coloured backgrounds which makethem stand out much worse ', 'EB': 'are created as readonly Text fields instead of Labels.I guess this isso that their values can be selected and copied by the user (?) ', 'SR': ''}
